A Poets borne, not made:  No wonder then</br>Though Spencer, Sidney:  (miracles of men,</br>Sole English Makers; whose ev'n names so hie</br>Express by implication Poesy)</br>Were long unparaleld:  For nature bold</br>In their creation, spent that precious mould,</br>That Nobly better earth, that purer spirit</br>Which Poets, as their Birth-rights, claime t' inherite:</br>And in their great production, Prodigall;</br>Carelesse of futures well-nye spent her all</br>Viewing her work:  conscious sh' had suffred wracke</br>Hath caus'd our Countrymen eer since to lacke</br>That better earth, had forme:  Long thrifty growne</br>Who truely might beare Poets, brought forth none:</br>Till now of late, seeing her stockes new-full</br>(By Time, and Thrift) of matter beautifull,</br>And quint-essence of formes; what severall</br>Our elder Poets graces had, those all</br>Shee now determin'd to unite in one;</br>So to surpasse her selfe; and call'd him Browne.</br>That beggard by his birth, shee's now so poore</br>That of true Makers shee can make no more.</br>Hereof accus'd; answer'd, shee meant that hee</br>A species should, no individuum bee.</br>That (Phoenix-like) Hee in himselfe should find</br>Of Poesy contain'd each severall kind.</br>And from this Phoenix's urne, thought shee could take</br>Whereof all following-Poets well to make.</br>For of some forme, shee had, now made knowne</br>They were her errours whilst sh' intented Browne.

Not Aeglogues your, but Eclogues:  To compare:</br>Virgil's selected, yours elected are.</br>He Imitates, you Make:  and this your creature</br>Expresseth well your Name, and theirs, their Nature.</br>
